json.schema:
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="l2IsolationDomains">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="l3IsolationDomains">
<prop type="array" name="exportRouteTargets" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="importRouteTargets" required="True">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="racks">

help.short: ASN of CE devices for CE/PE connectivity. The value should be between 1 to 65535. Example : 65123
Configuration to be used to setup the management network.

arg.arg:
<arg type="array" var="@OptionBProperties_create.exportRouteTargets" options="export-route-targets" required="True" group="">
<arg type="array" var="@OptionBProperties_create.importRouteTargets" options="import-route-targets" required="True" group="">

help.short: Option B configuration to be used for management vpn.
Network Fabric Controller ARM resource id
Fabric SKU id based on the SKU of the BoM that was ordered
Number of racks associated to Network Fabric.Possible values are from 2-8.
Number of servers.Possible values are from 1-16.
Network and credentials configuration currently applied to terminal server.
IPv4 Address Prefix of CE-PE interconnect links. Example : 172.31.0.0/31.
IPv6 Address Prefix of CE-PE interconnect links. Example : 3FFE:FFFF:0:CD30::a0/126.
Secondary IPv4 Address Prefix of CE-PE interconnect links. Example : 172.31.0.20/31.
Secondary IPv6 Address Prefix of CE-PE interconnect links. Example : 3FFE:FFFF:0:CD30::a4/126.

prop.name: managementNetworkConfiguration
prop.prop:
<prop type="array" name="exportRouteTargets" arg="@OptionBProperties_create.exportRouteTargets" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="importRouteTargets" arg="@OptionBProperties_create.importRouteTargets" required="True">

json.schema:
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="l2IsolationDomains">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="l3IsolationDomains">
<prop type="array" name="exportRouteTargets" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="importRouteTargets" required="True">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="racks">

help.short: Azure resource tags that will replace the existing ones.
Network and credentials configuration already applied to terminal server.

json.schema:
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="l2IsolationDomains">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="l3IsolationDomains">
<prop type="array" name="exportRouteTargets" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="importRouteTargets" required="True">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="racks">
